name: AskthePlannerWeddingTipsinaFlash
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ready to enjoy the best day ever? Get expert, insider tips on how to style, plan, and execute your modern wedding from Desirée Adams, Owner of Verve Event Co., an award-winning wedding and event planning company in Upstate New York. Hear how to manage vendors, avoid surprises, and plan your day with honest advice from a pro.

The number of choices and decisions you make to plan a wedding is staggering. Get real advice from a professional planner with over 10 years experience planning high-level events around the country. This briefing will:

1) Help you plan and enjoy the contemporary wedding you always wanted
2) Be real with you and give candid advice so you can avoid the drama

Here are some tips to navigate the skill. After enabling this skill, say things like, "Alexa, what's my flash briefing?" or "Alexa, what's in the news?" to hear this flash briefing. When the skill starts to play, it will play the newest tips first, but it will only play the tips for that week. New tips will be published every Monday, Wednesday, and Fri-yay. 

If you want to catch up on tips you've missed, visit https://verveeventco.com/asktheplanner. You can also send questions you would like answered in future briefings to hello@verveeventco.com.

Go to Settings in your Alexa app and Find "Flash Briefing" to move this briefing to the top of your news brief. 

For more information, visit https://verveeventco.com/asktheplanner
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
